mapper.sql: t.ID as t_ID, t.CREATED as t_CREATED, t.MODIFIED as t_MODIFIED, t.NAME as t_NAME, t.WORKER as t_WORKER, t.FLAG as t_FLAG, t.DETAIL as t_DETAIL, t.YEAR as t_YEAR, t.MONTH as t_MONTH, t.ONEITEMS as t_ONEITEMS, t.TWOITEMS as t_TWOITEMS, t.THREEITEMS as t_THREEITEMS, t.FOURITEMS as t_FOURITEMS, t.FIVEITEMS as t_FIVEITEMS, t.PERIOD as t_PERIOD, t.COUNT as t_COUNT, t.WORKLOAD as t_WORKLOAD, t.UNITPRICE as t_UNITPRICE, t.REAL_WORKLOAD as t_REAL_WORKLOAD, t.DEADLINE as t_DEADLINE, t.STATUS as t_STATUS, t.FEEDBACKTIME as t_FEEDBACKTIME, t.PURPOSE as t_PURPOSE, t.CONFIRMTIME as t_CONFIRMTIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from task t
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into task (ID, CREATED, MODIFIED, NAME, WORKER, FLAG, DETAIL, YEAR, MONTH, ONEITEMS, TWOITEMS, THREEITEMS, FOURITEMS, FIVEITEMS, PERIOD, COUNT, WORKLOAD, UNITPRICE, REAL_WORKLOAD, DEADLINE, STATUS, FEEDBACKTIME, PURPOSE, CONFIRMTIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneitems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{twoitems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{threeitems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fouritems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fiveitems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workload,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realWorkload,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{feedbacktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confirmtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into task
ID,
CREATED,
MODIFIED,
NAME,
WORKER,
FLAG,

CONFIRMTIME,

update task t
t.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.CREATED = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
t.MODIFIED = #{record.modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
t.NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t.WORKER = #{record.worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update task
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIED = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKER = #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ONEITEMS = #{oneitems,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TWOITEMS = #{twoitems,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
